{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=VF7811 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B003WD8GOO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/10/2008 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=S9GVF7XX1 |ic_id=5912A-VF7XX1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P28V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46V16M16-5B |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9106 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:24:82, 68:92:34, 74:91:1A |oui_eth=00:24:82, 68:92:34, 74:91:1A |default_ch= }} ''7811 Multimedia Wireless Access Point''
"Giterdone 8" is silkscreened on the component side of the board in the FCC photos. :"POWERED BY RUCKUS WIRELESS" and "FAB 100-11118-001 REV 7" is on the back of the board.F
The included power adapter appears to be a '''Ruckus Wireless''' P/N: 740-00005-001, DSA-12R-12 AUS 120120 (12V, 1A).
The FCC manual specifies the default SSID as '''V54-XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 6 characters of the MAC address. :The default credentials are also specified as super:sp-admin.
